package-manager.name: depot
package-manager.title: C library for multiple precision complex arithmetic
package-manager.vendor: Andreas Enge, Philippe Theveny and Paul Zimmermann
package-manager.description: MPC is a C library for the arithmetic of complex numbers with arbitrarily high precision and correct rounding of the result. It is built upon and follows the same principles as Mpfr.
